author: A_Brickset_user
title: Need a larger field?  Here's a set to help!
review: This set is good for anyone looking to make a bigger soccer field.  I added two to my "championship challenge" and they fit in flawlessly.  And hey, here's a set for some extra soccer players!  Overall, nice set as an addition, but definitely not a 'stand-alone' set.

author: mrmitch
title: 4 Mini figures - can make field bigger
review: I got this set on sale, otherwise I would not own it. Does have four mini figs.(a plus) and other pieces that I use occasionally for other building. If your into soccer or football probably a must have.

author: DarthVader_
title: Cool set!
review: I got this set in 2007 at a store that sells old Lego Sets!  It is awesome!  I wish I had the huge soccer set so that I could extend it!:(  Oh well, I like using the parts and it is good enough for it to be like a practice game!  It is cool!

author: clone_commander_trainrex
title: Goal
review: Great pieces.  This set is so cool.  It has extra seats for players and those cool green pieces.  I made posts and played a game with them.  The minifigures are also very good.  Overall it is so cool so get this expansion even without previously owning soccer sets.

author: Flash88
title: Time for expansion
review:
A perfect set for me, and a great idea to release it.

The 5-a-side Championship Challenge is great as it is, but the expansion pack adds another dimension. Yes it does require you to re-build your original Championship challenge, but the results are fantastic.

Pointless owning this set without the Championship Challenge, although the four minifigs are a bonus!
